# patchType

**Instance Property**

The tessellation patch type of a post-tessellation vertex function.

## Declaration

```swift
var patchType: MTLPatchType { get }
```

## Discussion

This value is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPatchType/none] if the function isn’t a post-tessellation vertex function.

## Identifying the tessellation patch

- **patchControlPointCount**: The number of patch control points in the post-tessellation vertex function.
- **MTLPatchType**: Types of tessellation patches that can be inputs of a post-tessellation vertex function.
